item.title: Version 0.15.1
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.15.1

What’s New

  • Update Notifications: A new in-sidebar notification alerts you after each update with the release title and a “Learn More” link to the full release notes. Appears once per update and can be dismissed.
  • Space Finder: Quickly find and switch between spaces, even with 15-20+. Type a space name in the command panel (⌘⌃K) to see matching spaces in results, or right-click the bottom bar or any space icon for a full space list.

Improvements

  • Manual Hide Respected: When you manually hide the sidebar (shortcut, menu bar, button, or Escape), it stays hidden while you keep browsing. Auto-show resumes automatically once you switch to another app and come back. Mouse hover to the screen edge still works anytime.
  • Auto-show Paused Notification: A brief notification appears when you manually hide the sidebar, letting you know auto-show is paused. Can be turned off in Sidebar preferences under “Show Manual Hide Notification”.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed sidebar reappearing immediately after manual hide when clicking on a browser window.
